mapper.select: SELECT a.`name`, a.`value`, a.`status`, a.`explain`, a.`tdate`, a.`datetime1`, a.`datetime2`, a.`month`, a.`day`, a.`period`, a.`days`, a.`time` FROM AS a
SELECT COUNT(a.id) AS strategy_number, c.group_number FROM AS a JOIN (SELECT COUNT(b.id) AS group_number FROM AS b WHERE b.sys_user_id in ${userids}) AS c
SELECT COUNT(a.c_client_id) AS cnormal FROM c_client_attr1 AS a WHERE a.staus = 1 AND a.sys_user_id in ${userids}
SELECT COUNT(a.c_gateway_id) AS gtotal FROM c_gateway_attr1 AS a WHERE a.c_gateway_type_id = 3 AND a.sys_user_id in ${userids}
SELECT COUNT(a.c_gateway_id) AS gnormal FROM c_gateway_attr1 AS a WHERE a.c_gateway_type_id = 3 AND a.staus = 1 AND a.sys_user_id in ${userids}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.c_client_id) AS fclient FROM b_client_fault AS a LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 AS b ON a.c_client_id = b.c_client_id WHERE b.sys_user_id in ${userids}
AND (a.`status` = 2 OR 8)
SELECT SUM(a.power) AS power FROM b_term_power_daily_report AS a LEFT JOIN c_term AS b ON a.c_term_id = b.id WHERE a.`day` = CURDATE() AND b.sys_user_id in ${userids}
